SELECT D.FILE_ID , D.CUST_BILL_REF1 , D.CUST_BILL_REF2 , TO_CHAR(D.AMOUNT/ 100,'99,999.00') AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(D.TRANS_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') TRANS_DT , D.SLIP_NO , S.NAME STATUS , D.REM FROM PAY0303D D JOIN SYS0038M S ON S.STUS_CODE_ID = D.STUS WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId}
AND D.STUS = 4
AND D.STUS <> 4
ORDER BY D.FILE_ITM_ID
